Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html#/c.name: -getViewController
Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html#/c.abstract: Get view controller to display user authentication on top of.

Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html#/c.name: -shouldLaunchSignInVCIfRefreshTokenIsExpired
Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html#/c.abstract: If refresh token is expired, let the user decide if the signInVC should be presented or an error should be returned.

Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html.name: AWSCognitoAuthDelegate
Protocols/AWSCognitoAuthDelegate.html.abstract: For obtaining current view controller to interact with the end user

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: signInRedirectUri
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: uri to redirect on sign in. Must be configured as a uri scheme in your info.plist

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: signOutRedirectUri
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: uri to redirect on sign out. Must be configured as a uri scheme in your info.plist

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: webDomain
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: The FQDN of your Cognito endpoint, something like https://mydomain.region.auth.amazoncognito.com

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: identityProvider
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: The optional provider name to authenticate with directly instead of presenting the end user with a list of configured providers

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: idpIdentifier
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: The optional provider identifier to authenticate with directly instead of presenting the end user with a list of configured providers. Use this if you want to hide the provider name from the end user.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: userPoolId
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: The optional user pool id, required if you have enabled advanced security features on your pool.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: asfEnabled
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: Whether user context information to drive the advanced security feature is emitted.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.name: isSFAuthenticationSessionEnabled
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthConfiguration.html.abstract: If using iOS 11 or above, the SDK will use SFAuthenticationSession for signIn and signOut operations if this flag is set. Below iOS 11, the SDK will use SFSafariViewController regardless of this setting.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: delegate
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Set this delegate to obtain the current view controller to interact with the end user

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: signedIn
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Determines whether there is an active session or not. If the refresh token is expired

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: +defaultCognitoAuth
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Fetches the Cognito User Pool instance configured in the info.plist under AWS->CognitoUserPool->Default

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: +registerCognitoAuthWithAuthConfiguration:forKey:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Register a managed instance with name forKey and configuration authConfiguration.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: +CognitoAuthForKey:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Fetch a managed instance with a particular AuthConfiguration.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -launchSignInWithViewController:completion:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Launches the signin UI and updates the session after the user logs in.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -launchSignInWithWebUI:completion:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Launches the signin UI and updates the session after the user logs in.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -getSessionWithWebUI:completion:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Get a session with id, access and refresh tokens.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -getSession:completion:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Get a session with id, access and refresh tokens.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -getSession:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Get a session with id, access and refresh tokens, use delegate to get view controller.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -signOut:completion:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Sign out locally and from the server.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -signOut:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Sign out locally and from the server, use delegate to get view controller.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -signOutLocallyAndClearLastKnownUser
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Remove user session from keychain and clear last known username.

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.name: -application:openURL:options:
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html#/c:objc(cs)A.abstract: Method to handle app redirect. Call from AppDelegate application:openURL:options

Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html.name: AWSCognitoAuth
Classes/AWSCognitoAuth.html.abstract: A lightweight web-based ui to manage signup/signin of your end users

Classes/AWSCognitoAuthUserSession.html.name: AWSCognitoAuthUserSession
Classes/AWSCognitoAuthUserSession.html.abstract: A User session. Encapsulates all tokens (id, access and refresh tokens) for a user.

Type%20Definitions.html.name: Type Definitions
Type%20Definitions.html.abstract: The following type definitions are available globally.
